articles.title: About this site
articles.description:
I created this site using only R programming language (libraries distill, rmarkdown, and postcards).
You can find here information about me and visualization that was done with R for political project.

articles.title: Buti Alnuaimi
articles.contents:
My R-Based Website
          
          
          Home
          About
          Blog
          â˜°
          
          
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Buti Alnuaimi
            
            
              
                
            
          
        
        
        
          
            I am interested in applying statistical methods to
            real-world political and social questions. I enjoy working
            with R to simulate experiments, estimate causal effects, and
            communicate results through clear visualizations. My
            academic interests include experimental design, causal
            inference, and the ethical implications of data-driven
            decision-making. I focus on translating quantitative
            findings into plain-language insights for non-technical
            audiences. I am particularly interested in political
            behavior, public opinion, and digital campaign strategies. I
            aim to continue developing skills in regression modeling,
            experimental analysis, and responsible data use.
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Buti Alnuaimi
